entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
